title: Easy Stovetop Granola
directions: In a medium skillet over medium heat, add chopped nuts and oats. Toast for 3 to 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until the oats are golden, and the nuts are fragrant but not burnt.
Add oil or butter and mix well to coat the oats, mashing oats into oil with the back of your spoon.
Add honey and sprinkle salt and stir well until coated, using the back of the spoon to mash the honey into oats if needed, to make sure that all of the i oats are coated.
Remove from the heat and put on waxed paper lined plate or greased plate to allow to cool.
ingredients: 1/2 cup walnuts or almonds (or mix of both)
2 tablespoons coconut oil, canola oil, or butter
